statements.select:
SELECT AA.CAL_DATE , AA.WEEK_NAME , AA.CAL_YEAR , AA.CAL_MONTH , AA.CAL_DAY , AA.QUARTER , AA.DAY_OF_WEEK , AA.DAY_OF_YEAR , AA.WEEK_OF_MONTH , AA.WEEK_OF_YEAR , AA.HOLIDAY_YN , AA.HOLIDAY_NAME , AA.REMARKS , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UAA.CALENDAR AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.REMARKS LINE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.CAL_DATE LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' )
AND AA.CAL_YEAR = #CAL_YEAR#
AND AA.CAL_DATE = #CAL_DATE#
ORDER BY AA.CAL_DATE ASC
statements.update: UPDATE UAA.CALENDAR SET HOLIDAY_YN = #HOLIDAY_YN# , HOLIDAY_NAME= #HOLIDAY_NAME# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE CAL_DATE = #CAL_DATE#
